title: Ticket #4765: 'Down Globus Resource' error message should be gateway agnostic
description:
When submitting to a down CE, you will see error messages about 'Down Globus Resource': 

020 (788.000.000) 12/09 16:56:17 Detected Down Globus Resource
    RM-Contact: fermicloud133.fnal.gov
...
026 (788.000.000) 12/09 16:56:17 Detected Down Grid Resource
    GridResource: condor condorce.example.com condorce.example.com:9619

Now that HTCondor CE can be used as an alternative to the GRAM job gateway, we should make the error more agnostic i.e. 'Detected Down Grid Resource'.
remarks:
2014-Dec-10 09:20:02 by jfrey:
The "Detected Down Grid Resource" event is the more agnostic form. The older "Detected Down Globus Resource" event was kept for older consumers of the job event log. Now, we should either remove the Globus-specific events or write them only for GRAM jobs.
